data.name: Ajani, Inspiring Leader
data.oracle_text:
+2: You gain 2 life. Put two +1/+1 counters on up to one target creature.
−3: Exile target creature. Its controller gains 2 life.
−10: Creatures you control gain flying and double strike until end of turn.

data.name: Inspiring Bard
data.oracle_text:
When Inspiring Bard enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Bardic Inspiration — Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
• Song of Rest — You gain 3 life.
data.flavor_text: "Wake up, my friends! There are deeds to be done and treasures to be won!"

data.name: Inspiring Call
data.oracle_text: Draw a card for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it. Those creatures gain indestructible until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: "Now is the hour. Ours is the duty. For victory and family—charge!"

data.name: Inspiring Captain
data.oracle_text: When Inspiring Captain enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: "Time to show the foe our true mettle."

data.name: Inspiring Cleric
data.oracle_text: When Inspiring Cleric enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
data.flavor_text: "The Immortal Sun will bring us true eternal life to replace the everlasting shadow of undeath."

data.name: Inspiring Commander
data.oracle_text: Whenever another creature with power 2 or less enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life and draw a card.

data.name: Inspiring Leader
data.oracle_text: Commander creatures you own have "Creature tokens you control get +2/+2."
data.set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
data.flavor_text: Your family needed a farmer, so you tilled. Your town needed a fighter, so you trained. When your people needed a leader, you knew what you had to do.

data.name: Inspiring Overseer
data.oracle_text:
Flying
When Inspiring Overseer enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life and draw a card.
data.flavor_text:
"This city could certainly use a bit more divine intervention."
—Inspector Jillard

data.name: Inspiring Refrain
data.oracle_text:
Draw two cards. Exile Inspiring Refrain with three time counters on it.
Suspend 3—{2}{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {2}{U} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

data.name: Inspiring Roar
data.oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
data.flavor_text:
"This is about more than aether or inventions. Tezzeret's schemes must be stopped!"
—Ajani Goldmane

data.name: Inspiring Statuary
data.oracle_text: Nonartifact spells you cast have improvise. (Your artifacts can help cast those spells. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)
data.flavor_text: Ghirapur's most celebrated inventors have been immortalized in clockwork.

data.name: Inspiring Unicorn
data.oracle_text: Whenever Inspiring Unicorn attacks, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: There are two lives: the life you live before you see a unicorn, and the life you live after.

data.name: Inspiring Vantage
data.oracle_text:
Inspiring Vantage enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
data.flavor_text: Ghirapur is a beacon of inspiration, attracting the most brilliant minds on Kaladesh.

data.name: Inspiring Veteran
data.oracle_text: Other Knights you control get +1/+1.
data.flavor_text: "I fight for my daughter, who may not set foot on a battlefield for many years. Remember who you fight for."

data.flavor_text: There are two lives: the life you live before you see a unicorn, and the life you live after.

data.name: Inspiring Vantage
data.oracle_text:
Inspiring Vantage enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
data.flavor_text: Ghirapur is a beacon of inspiration, attracting the most brilliant minds on Kaladesh.

data.name: Inspiring Veteran
data.oracle_text: Other Knights you control get +1/+1.
data.flavor_text: "I fight for my daughter, who may not set foot on a battlefield for many years. Remember who you fight for."

data.name: Ajani, Inspiring Leader
data.oracle_text:
+2: You gain 2 life. Put two +1/+1 counters on up to one target creature.
−3: Exile target creature. Its controller gains 2 life.
−10: Creatures you control gain flying and double strike until end of turn.

data.name: Inspiring Bard
data.oracle_text:
When Inspiring Bard enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Bardic Inspiration — Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
• Song of Rest — You gain 3 life.
data.flavor_text: "Wake up, my friends! There are deeds to be done and treasures to be won!"

data.name: Inspiring Call
data.oracle_text: Draw a card for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it. Those creatures gain indestructible until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: "Now is the hour. Ours is the duty. For victory and family—charge!"

data.name: Inspiring Captain
data.oracle_text: When Inspiring Captain enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: "Time to show the foe our true mettle."

data.name: Inspiring Cleric
data.oracle_text: When Inspiring Cleric enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
data.flavor_text: "The Immortal Sun will bring us true eternal life to replace the everlasting shadow of undeath."

data.name: Inspiring Commander
data.oracle_text: Whenever another creature with power 2 or less enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life and draw a card.

data.name: Inspiring Leader
data.oracle_text: Commander creatures you own have "Creature tokens you control get +2/+2."
data.set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
data.flavor_text: Your family needed a farmer, so you tilled. Your town needed a fighter, so you trained. When your people needed a leader, you knew what you had to do.

data.name: Inspiring Overseer
data.oracle_text:
Flying
When Inspiring Overseer enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life and draw a card.
data.flavor_text:
"This city could certainly use a bit more divine intervention."
—Inspector Jillard

data.name: Inspiring Refrain
data.oracle_text:
Draw two cards. Exile Inspiring Refrain with three time counters on it.
Suspend 3—{2}{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {2}{U} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

data.name: Inspiring Roar
data.oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
data.flavor_text:
"This is about more than aether or inventions. Tezzeret's schemes must be stopped!"
—Ajani Goldmane

data.name: Inspiring Statuary
data.oracle_text: Nonartifact spells you cast have improvise. (Your artifacts can help cast those spells. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)
data.flavor_text: Ghirapur's most celebrated inventors have been immortalized in clockwork.

data.oracle_text: Whenever Inspiring Unicorn attacks, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: There are two lives: the life you live before you see a unicorn, and the life you live after.
